explanation: [0-0] A little girl in a green top and a pink floral skirt is standing in a room, drawing the windows of a house on a gray wall with crayons. She has already drawn the fence and the outline of the house. On the upper left of the wall, there is a drawing of an alpaca wearing colorful sunglasses.

[0-4] A woman in a pink dress and white shoes walks into the frame. She has blonde hair tied in braids. She walks up to the little girl, who looks up at her and then runs off-screen to the left. The woman crouches down, looks at the drawing on the wall, sighs in resignation, shakes her head, and then stands up and walks away.

[4-10] Then, against a yellow background, a metal baking tray with cylindrical holes appears in the frame. A red spoon filled with yogurt pours the yogurt into the holes, and a white caption "YOGURT" appears on the screen. Then, a hand holds a bottle and drops red dye onto the yogurt, and then stirs the yogurt with a small wooden stick, gradually turning the yogurt orange.
